PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-00462022-02-01,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 — Twenty-Fourth and Twenty-Fifth Qualifying Periods)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 — TWENTY-FOURTH QUALIFYING PERIOD AND TWENTY-FIFTH QUALIFYING PERIOD) in order to temporarily (1) expand the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy (CEWS) and Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy (CERS) for entities subject to a public health order that restricts capacity by at least 50%; and (2) lower the current-month revenue loss threshold and minimum wage and rent subsidy rates, from December 19, 2021 to February 12, 2022.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0011 Publication Date: 2022-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
